title: Aside from an attorney where do I start legal action for cemetery reselling plots we have already purchased?
question: My parents bought 3 burial plots when my brother passed. Labeled 1, 2, 3 for visual. On 7/13/18 my father passed. My brother was buried in 2 so my parents could go on either side. Today plots 1 and 3 have been sold and a person has been buried in plot 1 with grave marker. plot 3 sold to another person and has no marker. This is according to their records.
answer_card_text:
Answer
